bibl.title: Three Late Antique Descripta from P.Amh. II.
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: P. Amh. II, 185 descr. = P. Gascou 37. Account related to the vintage. Provenance unknown, 6th or early 7th century AD. - 186 descr. = P. Gascou 38. Tax receipt. Hermopolite, end of 7th or 8th century AD. - 187 descr. = P. Gascou 39. Writing exercise (?) [in Coptic]. Middle Egypt, 6th or 7th century AD. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.13 P. Amh. II, 187 descr. = P. Gascou 39 141.4 P. Amh. II, 185 descr. = P. Gascou 37; 186 descr. = P. Gascou 38
Todd M. Hickey, Three Late Antique Descripta from P.Amh. II.
Jean-Luc Fournet & Arietta Papaconstantinou (edd.), Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P. Gascou) = TravMém 20 (2016) 1, pp. 233-242, 3 figg.; - 658.

P. Amh. II, 185 descr. = P. Gascou 37. Account related to the vintage. Provenance unknown, 6th or early 7th century AD. - 186 descr. = P. Gascou 38. Tax receipt. Hermopolite, end of 7th or 8th century AD. - 187 descr. = P. Gascou 39. Writing exercise (?) [in Coptic]. Middle Egypt, 6th or 7th century AD. - Avec résumé en anglais.
